DOC.brief_summary: A computerised neuropsychological test battery to be used as a standardised tool assessing the cognitive domains affected by idiopathic normal pressure hydrocephalus INPH was developed. The aim of this study is to investigate the reliability, validity and feasibility of the battery.
DOC.brief_title: Computerized Neuropsychology in Idiopathic Normal Pressure Hydrocephalus (INPH)
